The plant has a distinctive appearance with its bright yellow to golden green coloration, which is particularly noticeable during the growing season. Its structure consists of a thallus with leaf-like structures arranged in a rosette pattern. Isotrema paracletum plays a role in soil stabilization and provides microhabitats for various invertebrates.
